channel.title: How i get monster with hp?
channel.description: I tryed a while ago to play this game and i could get monster with hp so i left but im back now and i really want to know. no one helps me ever. :| so someone plz help me.

item.title: How i get monster with hp?
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

Err, open up npc.cfg and search for your monster wich you want to edit. If you did find that You see 2 colums, the first colum is the combat and the 2nd colum is the HP. Change the 2nd colum and DONE!

Read full topic

item.title: How i get monster with hp?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

What is your problem?
Your monsters having 0HP
Proberly you spawned them with ::npc [id]

How do you fix this?

  1. Go into your source.
  2. Open autospawn.cfg
  3. Scroll down to the end of your autospawn.cfg
  • Now you will see after/under something like “End of Autospawn” some text.
    Move that text to somewhere above the End of Autospawn (Or whatever it shows at your autospawn)
  1. Save it, Compiling isn’t needed.
  2. Done! Your monsters having Hp now.

Read full topic
item.source: How i get monster with hp?
